verses.verse: When Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall cut off<WH3772> the nations,<WH1471> whose land<WH776> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you,<WH3423> and you succeed them,<WH3427> and dwell in their cities,<WH5892> and in their houses;<WH1004>
you shall set apart<WH914> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> for you in the midst<WH8432> of your land,<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you to possess it.<WH3423>

You shall prepare<WH3559> you the way,<WH1870> and divide the borders<WH1366> of your land,<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> causes you to inherit,<WH5157> into three parts,<WH8027> that every manslayer<WH7523> may flee there.<WH5127>

This is the case<WH1697> of the manslayer,<WH7523> that shall flee<WH5127> there and live:<WH2425> whoever kills<WH5221> his neighbor<WH7453> unawares,<WH1097> and didn't<WH8130> hate him in time<WH8543> past;<WH8032>

as when a man goes<WH935> into the forest<WH3293> with his neighbor<WH7453> to chop<WH2404> wood,<WH6086> and his hand<WH3027> fetches a stroke<WH5080> with the axe<WH1631> to cut down<WH3772> the tree,<WH6086> and the head<WH1270> slips<WH5394> from the handle,<WH6086> and lights<WH4672> on his neighbor,<WH7453> so that he dies;<WH4191> he shall flee<WH5127> to one<WH259> of these cities<WH5892> and live:<WH2425>

lest the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> pursue<WH7291> the manslayer,<WH310> while<WH3588> his heart<WH3824> is hot,<WH3179> and overtake<WH5381> him,<WH1870> because the way is long,<WH7235> and strike him<WH5315> mortally;<WH5221> whereas he was not worthy<WH4941> of death,<WH4194> inasmuch as<WH3588> he didn't<WH8130> hate him in time<WH8543> past.<WH8032>
Therefore I command<WH6680> you,<WH559> saying, You shall set apart<WH914> three<WH7969> cities for yourselves.<WH5892>

If Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> enlarges<WH7337> your border,<WH1366> as he has sworn<WH7650> to your fathers,<WH1> and gives<WH5414> you all the land<WH776> which he promised<WH1696> to give<WH5414> to your fathers;<WH1>

if you keep<WH8104> all this commandment<WH4687> to do<WH6213> it,<WH6680> which I command you this day,<WH3117> to love<WH157> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and to walk<WH3212> ever<WH3117> in his ways;<WH1870> then you shall add<WH3254> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> more for yourselves,<WH7969> besides these three:

that innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> not be shed<WH8210> in<WH7130> the midst of your land,<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you for an inheritance,<WH5159> and so blood be on you.<WH1818>

But if any man<WH376> hates<WH8130> his neighbor,<WH7453> and lies in wait<WH693> for him,<WH6965> and rises up against him,<WH5221> and strikes him mortally<WH5315> so that he dies,<WH4191> and he flees<WH5127> into one<WH259> of these<WH411> cities;<WH5892>

then the elders<WH2205> of his city<WH5892> shall send<WH7971> and bring<WH3947> him there,<WH5414> and deliver him into the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood,<WH1818> that he may die.<WH4191>
Your eye<WH5869> shall not pity<WH2347> him,<WH1197> but you shall put away the innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> from Israel,<WH3478> that it may go well with you.<WH2895>

You shall not remove<WH5253> your neighbor<WH7453>'s landmark,<WH1366> which they of old time<WH7223> have set,<WH1379> in your inheritance<WH5159> which you shall inherit,<WH5157> in the land<WH776> that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you to possess it.<WH3423>

One<WH259> witness<WH5707> shall not rise up<WH6965> against a man<WH376> for any iniquity,<WH5771> or for any sin,<WH2403> in any sin<WH2399> that he sins:<WH2398> at the mouth<WH6310> of two<WH8147> witnesses,<WH5707> or at the mouth<WH6310> of three<WH7969> witnesses,<WH5707> shall a matter<WH1697> be established.<WH6965>
If an unrighteous<WH2555> witness<WH5707> rise up<WH6965> against any man<WH376> to testify<WH6030> against him of wrongdoing,<WH5627>

then both<WH8147> the men,<WH582> between whom the controversy<WH7379> is,<WH5975> shall stand before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> and the judges<WH8199> who shall be in those days;<WH3117>

and the judges<WH8199> shall make diligent<WH3190> inquisition:<WH1875> and,<WH5707> behold, if the witness is a false<WH8267> witness,<WH5707> and has testified<WH6030> falsely<WH8267> against his brother;<WH251>
then you shall do<WH6213> to him as he had thought<WH2161> to do<WH6213> to his brother:<WH251> so you shall put<WH1197> away<WH1197> the evil<WH7451> from the midst of you.<WH7130>
Those who remain<WH7604> shall hear,<WH8085> and fear,<WH3372> and shall henceforth<WH3254> commit<WH6213> no more any<WH1697> such evil<WH7451> in the midst of you.<WH7130>
Your eyes<WH5869> shall not pity:<WH2347> life<WH5315> for life,<WH5315> eye<WH5869> for eye,<WH5869> tooth<WH8127> for tooth,<WH8127> hand<WH3027> for hand,<WH3027> foot<WH7272> for foot.<WH7272>
